usefulItems: baking tray and paper, cling film, rolling pin, grill
title: Cajun Chicken and Sweet Potato Mash

ingredients.content: 850 g sweet potatoes, peeled, diced (2 cm)
4 chicken breasts, skinless, butterflied (sliced through horizontally almost to the edge then opened out)

preparations.content: Place black peppercorns, coarse salt, garlic powder, dried onions, cayenne pepper, oregano, thyme and chilli flakes in mixing bowl then grind <b>1 min/speed 10<b>. Transfer cajun spice mix to a bowl and set aside.
Preheat grill to 230°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper or foil.

Place water and sweet potato in mixing bowl then cook <b>15 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>. Meanwhile, place butterflied chicken breasts between two pieces of cling film and flatten using a rolling pin. Brush with olive oil and coat each breast with 1 Tbsp reserved cajun spice mix. Grill for 5 minutes (230°C) on each side until browned.
Drain sweet potatoes using simmering basket, discarding liquid then return potatoes to mixing bowl.
Add sweet chilli sauce and salt then mash <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then mash again <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Serve mash with grilled cajun chicken.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with a simple sweetcorn salad.
